title: Nora's Wish
description: Nora was a little girl, A girl who knew she could. She knew she'd one day change the world, And change the world, she would.Join Nora on her journey to change the world - one girl, one wish, at a time.Nora is quirky, she is undeniably herself, and she is the hope, strength and determination the world needs today, more than ever.
author: Norine Khalil
